title: How to prepare for physics class 11 in 6 months - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on in what you are focusing on… Are you aiming to crack an entrance exam or get great marks in your board exam or both. You first need to get your concepts right. Since you are in 11th class you can focus on ypur class notes, coaching notes and textvook to get grip over your concepts. Once you get grip over concept go for solving entrance questions as well as questions for your school exams. If you are aiming to crack an entranxe exam after 12th then be sure not to neglect practicing questions of the level of enternace exam from class 11th… otherwise you will regrey not preparing for enternace exam next year. Since few months have already passes by you might have grip over at least some topics, now focus on your weak topics. WEEKDAYS Morning before class Remeber to pre read for the class…What i mean by this is read your text before it is taught in class.At school or coaching Be attentive in class and make notesAsk doubts about what is being taught and also doubts from the previous class if you have any.After returning home Revise your CW notes.Solve questions from your textbook and reference related to school exam and entrance exam.WEEKENDS AND HOLIDAYS Complete any of your of your reading backlogs.Solve many questions relating to entrance exams.Solve some questions of your school exam pattern.Remember to never to overplan your day as it tends to demotivate you. Remember to reduce your distraction time… AND DON'T FORGET TO HAVE REST AND FUN…

If you have 6 month left for your examination and you need to prepare the 11th class physics then you should follow some of these steps: First of all make all your concept clear.make short notes and formula books for every chapter.Solve questions from various reference books. If you want to prepare subjectively then go for S Chand.In case of any doubt clear them as soon as possible.Repair subjective questions as well as the numericals perfectly.
